# alicloud\_actiontrail\_global\_events\_storage\_region

This data source provides the Actiontrail Global Events Storage Region of the current Alibaba Cloud user.

-> **NOTE:** Available in v1.201.0+.

## Example Usage

Basic Usage

```python
import constructs as constructs
import cdktf as cdktf
# Provider bindings are generated by running cdktf get.
# See https://cdk.tf/provider-generation for more details.
import ...gen.providers.alicloud as alicloud
class MyConvertedCode(cdktf.TerraformStack):
    def __init__(self, scope, name):
        super().__init__(scope, name)
        data_alicloud_actiontrail_global_events_storage_region_default =
        alicloud.data_alicloud_actiontrail_global_events_storage_region.DataAlicloudActiontrailGlobalEventsStorageRegion(self, "default")
        cdktf.TerraformOutput(self, "alicloud_actiontrail_global_events_storage_region_1",
            value=data_alicloud_actiontrail_global_events_storage_region_default.storage_region
        )
```

## Argument Reference

The following attributes are exported in addition to the arguments listed above:

* `storage_region` - Global Events Storage Region.
